title: MYpet权限设置后玩家无法打开技能树菜单
author: mn2015
txt_content:
设置如下，玩家带僵尸宠物输入/PCST时提示there are no skilltrees available for 僵尸
 Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - MyPet.*  
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.farm
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.pvp
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.combat
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.utility
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.ride
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.zombie
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.wolf
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.wither
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.spider
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.skeleton
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.silverfish
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.sheep
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.pigzombie
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.pig
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.ocelot
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.mooshroom
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.magmacube
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.irongolem
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.horse
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.enderman
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.creeper
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.cow
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.chicken
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.cavespider
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.blaze

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content:
mn2015 发表于 2016-5-25 23:55
Mypet版本2.0.0，加上MyPet.admin也没有用，新人金粒不多，求各位大大帮忙

抓宠物新的权限节点  - MyPet.leash.*
技能书权限MyPet.Skilltree.技能

replies.author: mn2015
replies.txt_content: Mypet版本2.0.0，加上MyPet.admin也没有用，新人金粒不多，求各位大大帮忙

replies.author: mn2015
replies.txt_content:
yangoo 发表于 2016-5-26 12:39
抓宠物新的权限节点  - MyPet.leash.*
技能书权限MyPet.Skilltree.技能
宠物能抓也能放生，玩家就是不能选择技能树，输入命令/pcst提示there are no skilltrees available for 。技能树节点都有，见1楼

replies.author: mn2015
replies.txt_content:
mn2015 发表于 2016-5-26 14:40
宠物能抓也能放生，玩家就是不能选择技能树，输入命令/pcst提示there are no skilltrees available for  ...
解决问题，主要是权限用的旧的，多了一个.custom，害死我了，搞了个把星期没发现
